description.value: At 8th level, you can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g]{Minor Creation} as a spell-like ability. You can have no more than one @Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g]{Minor Creation}active at a time. If you cast the spell again, the previous casting immediately ends. At 12th level, this ability improves to @Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{Major Creation}. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 1/2 your wizard level.
